snippet: The move comes after Honda last week expanded its airbag recall to include about 5 million cars.
abstract: Mazda has expanded nationwide recall of potentially defective airbags made by Takata after urging from federal safety regulators.

byline.original: By DANIELLE IVORY and REBECCA R. RUIZ

lead_paragraph: The move comes after Honda last week expanded its airbag recall to include about 5 million cars.

headline.main: Mazda Expands Recall of Takata Airbags
headline.print_headline: Mazda Expands Recall of Takata Airbags
